Delhi pit death case: Labourer who 1st spotted biker arrested for not informing authorities
description: A labourer, Yogesh, has been arrested for allegedly failing to report a biker's fall into a deep pipeline pit in Janakpuri. The injured biker, Kamal Dhyani, remained trapped for eight hours before authorities were alerted. The sub-contractor, Rajesh Kumar Prajapati, also arrested, reportedly saw Dhyani but left without informing anyone.

title: Who is Coco Jones? Grammy‑winning singer behind Black anthem at Super Bowl LX
description: Coco Jones performed “Lift Every Voice and Sing” before Super Bowl LX at Levi’s Stadium, drawing both praise and backlash online. While many applauded her powerful vocals, critics questioned the NFL’s continued inclusion of the song, often called the Black national anthem. The league has featured it since 2020 following nationwide protests against racial injustice.

description: BCCI secretary Devajit Saikia has dismissed rumors of any tension between head coach Gautam Gambhir and star batter Virat Kohli, describing their relationship as cordial.  Despite past IPL run-ins and speculation surrounding Kohli's career phases, Saikia stated he's never witnessed them fighting. Their successful partnership in India's 2025 Champions Trophy win further underscores unity.

title: Drake Maye’s wife Ann Michael lands big DoorDash deal ahead of Super Bowl 2026
description: Drake Maye’s wife, Ann Michael Hudson, partnered with DoorDash, a $78.6 billion company, ahead of the Patriots’ Super Bowl matchup with the Seahawks. She shared a playful Instagram reel promoting New England cuisine while teasing Seattle. Hudson also posted weekend moments with Maye and friends and recently addressed comparisons to Gisele Bündchen with grace and humor.

NEET-PG cut-off: Single-digit scores land PG seats in top med colleges
description: NEET-PG qualifying standards were drastically lowered, resulting in postgraduate medical seats in government colleges being filled with extremely low scores. Candidates secured spots in high-risk clinical specialties and premier institutions with scores as low as single digits, raising significant concerns within the medical community.

title: In 'clear message', Malaysia, India slam cross-border terror
description: Malaysia joined India in condemning cross-border terrorism, signaling a stronger alignment on the issue. Prime Minister Modi highlighted clear messages against terror with no double standards or compromise. The bilateral meeting saw numerous agreements signed, spanning defense, security, and economic cooperation, including semiconductors and social security for Indian workers.

title: 'Tried to aggressively push our farm interests in US trade deal': Piyush Goyal
description: Commerce minister Piyush Goyal highlighted the nation's strong stance in the US trade deal. The focus was on boosting farm exports and safeguarding sensitive sectors like dairy. The agreement opens new avenues for Indian products such as tea and coffee. Concerns about feed ingredient imports are addressed with a limited quota.

title: Missing sub-inspector from U.P.’s Basti found dead in Ayodhya; probe on
description: The deceased was identified as Sub-Inspector Ajay Gaur, who was posted at the Parsarampur police station in Basti district. He had gone missing under suspicious circumstances on February 5

description: The doctors said the 60-year-old man sustained injuries to his legs and body

title: Left politics a 'retrograde ideology': PM Modi
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi lauded BJP MP C Sadanandan Master's courage after he displayed prosthetic legs in Rajya Sabha, highlighting an attack by alleged CPM supporters. Modi criticized "retrograde ideology" for shrinking political ground, while praising Master's presence in Parliament. He also noted Kerala's fatigue with traditional alliances and appreciation for the BJP's vision.

title: Mahaveer Crystal Garden: Redefining Contemporary Living in Attapur
Isro study shows safe patch near Moon’s Mons Mouton for Chandrayaan-4 landing
description: ISRO scientists have identified a promising one-square-kilometre landing zone near Mons Mouton in the Moon's south polar region for the Chandrayaan-4 mission. Detailed terrain analysis using high-resolution images has shortlisted the MM-4 area as the safest option for India's first lunar sample return. This site offers gentle slopes, adequate sunlight, and minimal hazards, crucial for the mission's success.

title: Himachal CM Sukhu warns against scrapping Revenue Deficit Grants, urges cross-party appeal to PM

title: Rahul Gandhi's message to Gen Z: 'Be flexible and persevere'
description: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi advised Gen Z to be flexible and persevere, emphasizing that life is not linear. He shared insights from an interaction with NRI students, addressing their anxieties about confidence, judgment, and self-expression. Gandhi highlighted the importance of staying true to oneself amidst societal pressures and labels.

description: South Africa captain Aiden Markram said though Canada is a relatively unknown entity for them, they have done their homework

title: PM Modi sets May deadline to prioritise quality improvement of highways
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has set a May deadline for the road transport ministry to prioritize highway quality improvement and develop robust SOPs. This directive follows numerous complaints about poor road conditions, especially post-monsoon. The PM also called for action against underperforming contractors and a study into potential collusion affecting land acquisition delays.

title: India, Canada step up security cooperation
description: National Security Advisor Ajit Doval's visit to Canada has yielded a "shared workplan" for bilateral cooperation on national security and law enforcement. Both nations agreed to establish liaison officers to enhance communication and information sharing on critical issues like drug trafficking and organized crime. This move aims to rebuild trust and pave the way for future high-level engagements.

title: Italy cricket captain Madsen hopes T20 World Cup entry can inspire struggling football team
description: Italy, once football royalty, have struggled in recent qualifiers for the 2026 World Cup and are now looking to progress via the playoffs after failing to top their group

title: Trade deal a threat to India's interests: CPM
description: CPM and CPI(ML) Liberation have strongly criticized the Indo-US trade deal, alleging the BJP government has made significant concessions detrimental to India's economy, agriculture, and national sovereignty. Both parties demand the deal's details be made public and presented to Parliament, urging the government to halt any agreement harmful to Indian workers and farmers.

title: Electronics output up 6-fold, exports 8-fold in 11 yrs: Govt
description: India's electronics manufacturing has surged six-fold in production and eight-fold in exports over 11 years, making it the world's second-largest mobile phone maker. Driven by the production-linked incentive scheme, mobile production alone saw a more than 100-fold export increase, transforming India into a net exporter.

He asserted that the agreement protects farmers' interests and will boost Indian exports, particularly in textiles.

title: Why Bad Bunny appears blocked on TikTok ahead of Super Bowl performance
description: TikTok users are confused after finding Bad Bunny’s account blocked without ever searching or following him. Multiple creators shared proof, raising questions about glitches or automatic blocking tools. TikTok has not responded yet, and no official reason has been given. Fans continue to speculate while waiting for clarity from the platform.

title: Tom Brady and Alix Earle may be dating quietly as new video surfaces
description: Tom Brady and Alix Earle were spotted dancing together at a Super Bowl party in San Francisco, fueling rumors of a budding romance. The pair, who previously flirted on New Year's Eve and were seen together in St. Barths, appeared inseparable throughout the night. Their continued public appearances suggest a deeper connection beyond a casual encounter.

While the Grammy winner Bad Bunny has stayed silent about Charlie Kirk's organisation hosting an alternative event, Kid Rock has explained the intent behind doing so for fans.

title: India-US trade deal: Pact puts auto parts exporters in driver's seat
description: India's auto component industry is poised for significant growth following a trade deal with the US, offering preferential tariff treatment and zero-duty access for certain Indian auto parts. This agreement is expected to boost export competitiveness, deepen collaboration, and reinforce India's role in global automotive supply chains, opening new avenues for export-led expansion.

title: In a first for India, a desi aerospace firm gains in-orbit snooping capability, takes images of ISS
description: India's space sector has achieved a significant milestone as Azista Space successfully imaged the International Space Station from its own satellite. This groundbreaking "space watch" capability, demonstrated by the ABA First Runner satellite, marks a first for any Indian company. The feat enhances India's space situational awareness, crucial for protecting national assets in orbit.

title: Himanta vs Gogoi: Assam politics heats up with CM's explosive 'training in Pak' claim
description: Addressing a press conference ahead of the assembly elections, Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma claimed that Gogoi had undertaken a “very confidential visit” to Pakistan in December 2013 and was believed to have undergone “some kind of training” during his 10-day stay. “He stayed there for 10 days. Strangely, Gogoi was digitally silent and no social media post was made. We suspect he went through some kind of training in that period,” the chief minister said.

Vonn had been attempting a comeback despite a ruptured ACL.

description: Select YouTube TV users are reportedly receiving a four-month, $20 monthly discount, totaling $80 off, with eligibility appearing random. Users can check their subscription settings on a desktop browser for the offer. This follows previous credits issued during content blackouts, such as a $15 credit in 2022 and a $20 credit last year due to disputes with Disney.

description: Start renewal/porting process in advance; follow up persistently with intermediary/insurer; do not allow existing policy to lapse until the new cover is formally issued

title: Brittany Mahomes reacts to Matthew Stafford’s emotional MVP family tribute
description: Matthew Stafford captured his first AP MVP award after a standout season with the Rams, but it was his family tribute that stole the spotlight. Joined by his four daughters, Stafford became emotional during a touching message calling him a dad first. Brittany Mahomes reacted online, writing, “Okay crying omg,” showing heartfelt support for the moment.

title: Google employees send letter to top execs demanding to cut ties with DHS
description: Nearly 1,000 Google employees are demanding the company sever ties with the Department of Homeland Security, citing contracts with ICE and CBP. They allege Google's technology fuels "state violence and repression." The workers seek transparency on contracts, an immediate Q&A session, and assurances of safety for all employees, particularly those in vulnerable roles.
